article: It was Saturday yesterday. When Mrs Black  opened  the door and looked  _  , she smiled and said, "It's going to  _  a beautiful day." She woke her small son up at eight thirty and said to him, "Get up, Tod. We are going to the zoo  today  . Wash your hands and face, brush your teeth and eat your breakfast quickly. Tod was six years old. He was very happy  _  he liked going to the zoo very much. He said, "I dreamed I was  _  the zoo last night, Mummy." His mother was  _  , but she stopped and smiled at  her son  , "  _  did you do in the zoo in your dream?" Tod laughed and answered, "You know, Mummy. You  were there  in my dream, too."
